Mod.name: Hadal Difficulty
Mod.description:
A difficulty mod aiming to provide a uniquely painful experience.
[h1] What is changed? [/h1] [list] [*] Wands must be crafted [*] New Map (around twice the depth of vanilla map) [*] Orb requirement to progress through Holy Mountains [*] The Glomb (new boss) [*] Settings to enhance difficulty [/list]
[h1] Questions [/h1] [b] How do I acquire wands? [/b] Wands can be acquired from vanilla puzzles, chests, enemies and crafting. To craft a wand you need a brace, handle and a core. The core determines the tier of the wand. To craft a wand just throw the 3 parts together. [b] Aren't Orbs difficult to find? [/b] Yes. However, most of the orbs in Hadal are acquired from killing bosses. See the guide document for more information. [b] The Glomb? [/b] The Glomb. The arena to fight it can be accessed via a portal
